channel.title: I have some questions
channel.description:
Okay, first of all, how come whenever I change the messages that are displayed when you first log-in, it doesn't actually change. But i do get this message when compiling.
client.java:1: class, interface, or enum expected ss////////////////////////////////////////////////////////JoshsScape Server///// ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .
-------
I've done the ::banuser and ::ipbanuser commands. Is there a way to unban the user?
-------
How can I make/change commands?
------
Does anyone have a tutorial on how to make NPC's and then make them shops?
------
How can I change the max level for stats and combat?[br][size=1]Posted on: September 15, 2007, 08:18:51 PM[/size][hr]aNYONE?

item.title: I have some questions
item.dc:creator: @Omerata Omerata
item.description:
@Omerata wrote:

Try:

Right clicking on your compiler then click “edit”. Don’t edit anything but click “Save as” And where it say’s “save file type as” “all files” then click ok.

See if that works.

Read full topic

item.title: I have some questions
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

erc:

Whats L2Java? And what’s “ss”?

wat he means by “ss” is

client.java:1: class, interface, or enum expected
ss////////////////////////////////////////////////////////JoshsScape Server/////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

delte those 2 ss

Read full topic

item.title: I have some questions
item.dc:creator: @erc erc
item.description:
@erc wrote:

Okay, thanks.

But I need help with that gay compiling…

Read full topic

ss////////////////////////////////////////////////////////JoshsScape Server/////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
^
1 error
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .

I’ve done the ::banuser and ::ipbanuser commands. Is there a way to unban the user?

How can I make/change commands?

Does anyone have a tutorial on how to make NPC’s and then make them shops?

How can I change the max level for stats and combat?[br][size=1]Posted on: September 15, 2007, 08:18:51 PM[/size][hr]aNYONE?[/quote]

to unban jsut open the data file and find bannedusers and delete the name

@erc wrote:

Whats L2Java? And what’s “ss”?

item.title: I have some questions
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

  1. Delete the “ss”

  2. Somewhere in your files will be a bannedusers.txt or something of the like. Delete the name/IP from the list.

  3. L2java

  4. Yes

  5. L2java

Read full topic
